description: This file is a bash shell script providing CLI commands for managing OCI containers, including starting, stopping, listing, retrieving info, pausing, resuming, and executing commands inside containers. It acts as a utility script that sends JSON-RPC requests via curl to a local service for container management.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container using an OCI bundle from the specified directory or path.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification JSON file.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by container ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a specified container.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information about available CLI commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs an interactive CLI loop.
